豺.definition: dog-like animal; ravenous beast; dhole (Cuon Alpinus); jackal

豺狼.definition: jackal and wolf; ravenous wolf; fig. evil person; vicious tyrant

豺狼塞路.definition: ravenous wolves block the road (idiom); wicked people in power; a vicious tyranny rules the land

豺狼當塗.definition: ravenous wolves hold the road (idiom); wicked people in power; a vicious tyranny rules the land

豺狼當路.definition: ravenous wolves hold the road (idiom); wicked people in power; a vicious tyranny rules the land

豺狼當道.definition: ravenous wolves hold the road (idiom); wicked people in power; a vicious tyranny rules the land

豺狼虎豹.definition: lit. jackals, wolves, tigers and panthers (idiom); fig. nasty, cruel people
